note:
今天，苹果公司宣布，MacOS 11 Big Sur将于11月12日在所有受支持的设备上发布。该操作系统的更新是在6月份的苹果年度开发者大会上首次宣布的，自那以来一直在进行不同阶段的Beta测试。
Big Sur主要为苹果硅基Mac奠定基础。苹果公司表示，此次更新旨在最大限度地提高公司新的M1单片系统的性能，这一结合将使其能够在配备M1的Mac电脑上本地运行iOS和iPadOS应用程序，不过iOS/iPadOS开发者如果愿意的话，可以选择退出。
Big Sur对用户界面和许多应用程序进行了引人注目的视觉重新设计，包括桌面上类似iOS和iPadOS的通知中心面板。不过Big Sur的一些部分，比如新版Safari，已经发布给了运行Catalina的用户。
新版本的Messages增加了上个月iPhone iOS更新中的许多功能：固定对话、在线回复、@提及等等。用户也可以第一次在Mac上创建Memoji。
与此同时，这款地图应用程序有很多我们已经在iPhone上看到的功能(这是一种趋势)，包括室内地图、指南和类似谷歌街景的环顾功能。
随着这一版本的发布，苹果将完成其年度主要操作系统更新。IOS、iPadOS、WatchOS和TVOS都在更早的时候发布了大产品。
Big Sur将为支持的Mac电脑用户提供免费更新，它取代了上一个主要的更新-MacOS Catalina。这也是第一个被称为MacOS11而不是MacOS10或MacOSX的更新。在接下来的几周里，请密切关注我们的评论。
note_en:
Today, Apple announced that macOS 11 Big Sur will launch on all supported devices on November 12. The  operating system update was first announced at the company's annual developer conference in June and has been working its way through various phases of beta testing since.
 Big Sur primarily lays the groundwork for Apple Silicon-based Macs. Apple says the update has been designed to maximize the performance of  the company's new M1 system-on-a-chip and that the combination will make it possible to run iOS and iPadOS apps natively on  M1-equipped Macs, though iOS/iPadOS developers will be able to opt out of that if they choose.
 Big Sur introduces a notable visual redesign for the user interface and many apps, including an iOS- and iPadOS-like notification center panel on the desktop. Some parts of Big Sur, like a new version of Safari, have already been released to users running Catalina.
 A new version of Messages adds many features seen in last month's iOS update for iPhones: pinned conversations, inline replies, @ mentions, and more. Users can create memoji on the Mac for the first time as well.
 Meanwhile, the Maps app gets a bunch of features we've already seen on the iPhone (that's a trend, here) including indoor maps, guides, and the Google Street View-like Look Around feature.
 With this release, Apple will round out its annual major operating system updates. iOS, iPadOS, watchOS, and tvOS all got big releases earlier.
 Big Sur will be available as a free update for users of  supported Macs, and it replaces the last major update—macOS Catalina. It's also the first update to be called macOS 11 rather than macOS 10 or Mac OS X. Keep an eye out for our review in the coming weeks.
title: MacOS 11 Big Sur将于11月12日发布
title_en: macOS 11 Big Sur launches on November 12

note:
在今天上午的活动中，该公司称该系统是“M1芯片功能的终极体现”。至少，该系统似乎正在突破其新芯片所能做的极限。该系统支持长达17小时的网页浏览电池续航时间和20小时的视频播放续航时间--这是该公司对MacBook产品的最高评级。
目前还没有太多关于基准测试的细节，该公司声称，它的性能将比之前的型号提升近8倍，显卡速度提高5倍。是的，与MacBook Air不同的是，它的内部有一个风扇。不管是好是坏，TouchBar和熟悉的网络摄像头都回来了，尽管该公司声称有一些基于软件的性能提升。然而，麦克风已经得到了增强。
在djay Pro AI中，由于神经引擎令人惊叹的性能，将节拍、乐器和声道从录音中实时分离出来。
由于M1芯片具有改变游戏规则的每瓦特性能，一次充电可以编译四倍的代码。
和Air一样，价格也保持不变。该系统的起价为1,299美元(教育费为1,199美元)，从今天开始接受预订。它应该会在下周开始发货。
note_en:
During this morning’s event, the company called the system,  “the ultimate expression of what the M1 chip can do.” And at very least, the system does appear to be pushing the limits of what its new chip can do. The system supports a massive 17 hours of battery life for web browsing and 20 hours for video playback — that’s the highest rating the company has offered on a MacBook product.
   There’s not a ton of specifics on benchmarks at the moment, the company claims it will sport nearly a nearly 8x performance bump over the previous model, with 5x faster graphics. And yes, unlike the MacBook Air, there is a fan inside. For better or worse, the TouchBar returns here, as well, as does the familiar webcam, though the company is claiming some software-based performance bumps. The mics have been enhanced, however.
 Separate out beats, instrumentals, and vocal tracks from a recording in real time in djay Pro AI, thanks to the amazing performance of the Neural Engine.
  Compile four times as much code on a single charge, thanks to the game-changing performance per watt of the M1 chip.
   Like the Air, the price is staying put. The system starts at $1,299 (or $1,199 for education) and will be available for pre-order starting today. It should start shipping next week.
title: 13英寸的MacBook Pro配备了苹果新的M1芯片，起价为1,299美元
title_en: The 13-inch MacBook Pro gets Apple’s new M1 chip, starting at $1,299

note:
MacOS Big Sur保留了公司以加州为主题的命名方案，将带来全新的用户界面、新功能和性能改进。
IOS14的大部分功能都被移植过来了，包括改进的消息线程和在线回复，以及重新设计的地图应用程序。新的苹果软件还配备了一个新的控制中心，可以快速访问亮度、音量、Wi-Fi和蓝牙。
Safari也得到了亟需的一抹油漆。它配备了新的隐私和安全功能，包括内置的情报跟踪预防功能，可以阻止追踪者在网络上跟踪你，以及密码监控，使你不会使用之前被攻破的密码。
如果你想知道MacOS Big Sir是什么样子的，TechCrunch的布莱恩·海特(Brian Heater)在8月份尝试了这款新软件。
note_en:
macOS Big Sur — which stays with the company’s California-themed naming scheme — will arrive with a new and refreshed user interface, new features, and performance improvements.
 Much of the features  in iOS 14 are porting over — including improved Message threading and in-line replies and a redesigned Maps app. The new Apple software also comes with a new Control Center, with quick access to brightness, volume, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth.
 Safari also gets a much needed lick of paint. It comes with new privacy and security features, including an in-built intelligence tracking prevention that stops trackers following you across the web, and password monitoring to save you from using previously breached passwords.
 If you’re wondering what macOS Big Sir is like to work on, TechCrunch’s Brian Heater took the new software  for a spin in August.
title: 苹果将于11月12日发布MacOS Big Sur
title_en: Apple will release macOS Big Sur on November 12

note:
硬件工程高级经理Julie Broms说：“如果你把Mac mini和这个价位上最畅销的台式机进行比较，你会发现Mini的大小只有它的十分之一，但速度却快了五倍。”
M1配备四个高性能内核和四个高效率内核。它使用5纳米制程。有8个GPU内核和128个执行单元，这应该会带来2.6万亿次浮点运算的峰值性能。还有苹果用于机器学习任务的神经引擎。
据苹果公司称，新款Mac Mini在CPU性能方面比之前的机型快三倍。至于GPU性能，它的速度最高可达6倍。ML加速的速度也快了15倍。
在设备的背面，你会发现一个以太网端口，两个支持6K显示屏的迅雷/USB4端口，一个HDMI 2.0端口，两个USB A端口和一个3.5毫米耳机端口。
note_en:
“If you compare a Mac mini to the top-selling desktop in this price range, the Mini is one-tenth its size and yet it’s up to five times faster,” Hardware Engineering Senior Manager Julie Broms said.
 The  M1 features four high-performance cores and four high-efficiency cores. It uses a 5nm process. There are eight GPU cores with 128 execution units, which should lead to peak performance of 2.6 teraflops. There is also Apple’s neural engine for machine learning tasks.
  According to Apple, the new Mac Mini is up to three times faster than the previous model when it comes to CPU performance. As for GPU performance, it is up to six times faster. ML acceleration is also up to 15 times faster.
 At the back of the device, you’ll find an Ethernet port, two Thunderbolt/USB4 ports that support a 6K display, an HDMI 2.0 port, two USB A ports and a 3.5mm headphone port.
title: 苹果用苹果设计的M1芯片更新Mac Mini
title_en: Apple updates Mac Mini with Apple-designed M1 chip

note:
该短片是在周二的“再来一件事”活动结束后播出的，他们在会上展示了新的M1芯片和即将推出的MacBook Air、MacBook Pro和Mac Mini的新设计。霍奇曼的角色出现在一间白色的房间里，伴随着复古广告宣传活动的标志性曲调，同时谈到了新机器在电源管理方面的一些进步。
值得注意的是，贾斯汀·朗没有客串，目前还不清楚霍奇曼的亮相是否只会为今天的活动增光添彩，或者苹果是否有计划推出一场复古的广告宣传活动。然而，这是对苹果公司一项广受欢迎的活动的有趣认可。
note_en:
The short slot aired following the end of Tuesday’s “One More Thing” event where they showed off their new M1 chip and new designs for their upcoming MacBook Air, MacBook Pro and Mac Mini. Hodgman’s character appeared in a white room amid the vintage ad campaign’s signature tune, while touching on some of the new machines’ advances in power management.
 There was notably no cameo from  Justin Long   and it’s unclear whether Hodgman’s appearance will only grace today’s event or whether Apple has plans for a throwback ad campaign. Nevertheless, it was a fun nod to a popular campaign from Apple.
title: 苹果为基于ARM的Mac发布会带回了“我是个人电脑”的代言人
title_en: Apple brings back its ‘I’m a PC’ spokesman for ARM-based Mac launch event

note:
苹果公司推出了新的M1芯片，这将为其基于ARM的新一代Mac电脑提供动力。这是一个5纳米的处理器，就像为其最新iPhone提供动力的A14仿生处理器一样，但这是苹果第一次专门为Mac设计的处理器。这款新芯片将为苹果新款MacBook Air、MacBook Pro和Mac mini提供动力。
苹果公司表示，新处理器将专注于将能效与性能结合起来。它有一个8核的CPU，苹果公司说这是世界上每瓦特CPU性能最好的。苹果公司表示，它的峰值性能相当于普通笔记本电脑CPU的四分之一功耗。该公司表示，这款机型配备了四个快速CPU内核，再配上四个高效率内核，其性能可与现有的双核MacBook Air相媲美。
它与高达八核的GPU配对，苹果声称GPU提供了世界上速度最快的集成显卡。此外，M1处理器还拥有一个16核神经引擎、一个通用内存架构、一个“支持USB 4的苹果设计的迅雷控制器”、一个图像信号处理器、媒体编码和解码引擎，以及一系列安全功能。其中包括硬件验证的安全引导、加密和运行时保护。
为了了解新芯片的能效，苹果公司表示，采用该芯片的新MacBook Air一次充电可以播放长达18小时的视频(今年英特尔支持的MacBook Air为12小时)，并提供每次充电最长15小时的无线网页浏览(高于之前的11小时)。它也不需要风扇，这意味着笔记本电脑应该在附近安静地运行。
与此同时，新的13英寸MacBook Pro提供长达17小时的无线网页浏览(今年搭载英特尔(Intel)处理器的MacBook Pro为10小时)，以及20小时的视频播放(之前为10小时)。苹果公司表示，它提供了“Mac有史以来最长的电池续航时间”。
苹果公司声称，该芯片可以让Mac电脑立即从睡眠模式中醒来--类似于iPhone和iPad--即使在运行3D程序或编辑4K视频文件时也能提供良好的性能。
苹果公司表示，它已经针对新处理器优化了MacOS Big Sur以及所有应用程序。苹果公司表示，Final Cut Pro的速度最高可达6倍，Logic Pro处理的音频曲目量最高可达3倍。苹果公司表示，来自Adobe等第三方提供商的应用程序也将陆续推出。Lightroom将于今年晚些时候推出，Photoshop将于明年推出。
苹果正在为没有针对新处理器优化的应用程序提供Rosetta 2翻译软件，现有的iOS和iPadOS应用程序也将在新机器上本地运行。
在重申其在开发者大会上的声明时，苹果表示，预计将在未来两年内将其所有Mac电脑转换为自己的处理器。
苹果自己的处理器的开发意味着苹果将不再使用英特尔的处理器，十多年来，英特尔的处理器一直为苹果Mac提供动力。在回应今天的网络直播时，英特尔在一份声明中表示，它“专注于提供最先进的个人电脑体验和一系列重新定义计算的技术选择。”
英特尔表示：“我们相信，搭载英特尔处理器的个人电脑--比如基于第11代英特尔酷睿移动处理器的个人电脑--在他们最看重的领域为全球客户提供了最佳体验，同时也为开发者提供了最开放的平台，无论是现在还是未来。”
note_en:
Apple has introduced  the new M1 chip that will power its new generation of Arm-based Macs. It’s a 5nm processor, just like the A14 Bionic powering its latest iPhones, but it’s the first that Apple has designed specifically for the Mac. The new chip will power Apple’s new  MacBook Air,  MacBook Pro, and  Mac mini.
 Apple says the new processor will focus on combining power efficiency with performance. It has an eight-core CPU, which Apple says offers the world’s best performance per watt of a CPU. Apple says it delivers the same peak performance as a typical laptop CPU at a quarter of the power draw. It says this has four fast CPU cores, paired with four high-efficiency cores which by themselves offer comparable performance to an existing dual-core MacBook Air.
 It pairs this with up to an eight-core GPU, which Apple claims offers the world’s fastest integrated graphics. In addition, the M1 processor has a 16-core Neural Engine, a universal memory architecture, an “Apple-designed Thunderbolt controller with support for USB 4,” an image signal processor, media encode and decode engines, and a host of security features. These include hardware-verified secure boot, encryption, and runtime protections.
 For an idea of how power efficient the new chip is, Apple says its  new MacBook Air, which features the chip, can play up to 18 hours of video on a single charge (up from 12 hours on  this year’s Intel-powered MacBook Air) and offers up to 15 hours of wireless web browsing per charge (up from 11 hours previously). It also doesn’t need a fan, meaning the laptop should run near silently.
   Meanwhile, the new 13-inch MacBook Pro offers up to 17 hours of wireless web browsing (up from 10 hours with this year’s  Intel-powered MacBook Pro), and 20 hours of video playback (up from 10 hours before). Apple says it offers the “longest battery life ever in a Mac.”
 Apple claims the chip allows a Mac to instantly wake from sleep mode — similar to iPhones and iPads — and offer good performance even when running 3D programs or editing 4K video files.
 Apple says it’s optimized macOS Big Sur as well as all of its apps for the new processors. Final Cut Pro is up to six times faster, Apple says, and Logic Pro can handle up to three times the amount of audio tracks. Apps from third-party providers like Adobe are also coming, Apple says. Lightroom will launch later this year, with Photoshop following next year.
 Apple is offering Rosetta 2 translation software for apps not optimized for the new processors, and existing iOS and iPadOS apps will also run natively on the new machines.
 Reiterating the announcement it made back at its developer’s conference, Apple said it expects to transition all of its Macs to its own processors over the next two years.
 The development of its own processors means that Apple is transitioning away from using Intel’s processors, which have powered its Macs for over a decade. Responding to today’s webcast, Intel said in a statement that it is “focused on delivering the most advanced PC experiences and a wide range of technology choices that redefine computing.”
 “We believe Intel-powered PCs—like those based on 11th Gen Intel Core mobile processors—provide global customers the best experience in the areas they value most, as well as the most open platform for developers, both today and into the future,” Intel said.
title: 苹果推出M1芯片驱动其基于ARM的新型Mac电脑
title_en: Apple Introduces M1 Chip To Power Its New Arm-Based Macs

note:
苹果公司今天发布了一款采用苹果M1芯片的新Mac mini。苹果公司表示，与上一代Mac mini相比，新芯片的CPU性能提高了3倍，显卡性能提高了6倍。
新的Mac mini采用了相同的工业设计，但由于M1芯片，性能得到了极大的提升。苹果也降低了价格，现在起价为699美元。
苹果公司表示，Mac mini的速度是最常见的PC台式机的5倍。
M1芯片还首次将神经引擎引入Mac mini，实现了快速和高度优化的机器学习工作流程。
新款Mac mini今天开始订购，下周开始发货。

note_en:
Apple today announced a new Mac mini featuring the Apple M1 chip. Apple said the new chip enables up to 3x faster CPU performance, and up to 6x better graphics, than the previous generation Mac mini.
 The new Mac mini features the same industrial design, but with greatly overhauled performance thanks to the M1 chip. Apple also lowered the price, now starting at $699.
  Apple stated that the Mac mini is 5x faster than the most commonly sold PC desktops.
 The M1 chip also brings the Neural engine to the Mac mini for the first time, enabling fast and highly-optimized machine learning workflows.
   The new Mac mini is available to order today, and will start shipping next week.

title: 苹果发布了配备M1的最新Mac Mini，CPU速度提高了3倍，GPU速度提高了6倍，内存高达16 GB，存储容量为2TB，起价699美元
title_en: Apple announces an updated Mac Mini with M1, giving 3x faster CPU and 6x faster GPU, up to 16GB RAM and 2TB storage, starting at $699

note:
苹果公司今天发布了一款采用苹果M1芯片的13英寸MacBook Pro，取代了之前的英特尔x86机型。苹果保留了这款笔记本1299美元的价位不变。
与之前的13英寸MacBook Pro相比，8核CPU的性能提升了2.8倍。得益于M1芯片的效率，新款MacBook Pro一次充电可提供长达20小时的视频播放，是之前报价的两倍。
苹果公司表示，13英寸的MacBook Pro可与同类Windows笔记本电脑相媲美，性能最高可提升3倍。
M1芯片还为高速机器学习计算带来了神经引擎。苹果称它是世界上执行ML任务的速度最快的紧凑型专业笔记本电脑。
苹果还在13英寸的MacBook Pro上增加了“工作室级”麦克风阵列，并通过改进图像信号处理器对摄像头进行了升级。
新机器还配备了两个USB-C端口，支持USB 4和迅雷4，使电脑能够以全分辨率驱动6K Pro Display XDR。
然而，一个可能的缺点是：这款新的MacBook Pro似乎只有16 GB的内存。
新款MacBook Pro今天开始订购，并将于下周开始发货。

note_en:
Apple today unveiled a new 13-inch MacBook Pro featuring the Apple M1 chip, replacing the previous Intel x86 models. Apple retained the same $1299 price point for the notebook.
 The 8-core CPU offers up to 2.8x faster performance compared with the previous 13-inch MacBook Pro. Thanks to the efficiency of the M1 chip, the new MacBook Pro offers up to 20 hours of video playback on a single charge, twice the previous quoted figure.
  Apple says the 13-inch MacBook Pro compares favourably to Windows laptops in its class, offering up to 3x better performance.
 The M1 chip also brings the Neural Engine for high-speed machine learning compute. Apple called it the world’s fastest compact pro notebook for ML tasks.
 Apple also added its ‘studio quality’ mic array to the 13-inch MacBook Pro and upgraded the webcam through improvements to the image signal processor.
 The new machine also features two USB-C ports that support USB 4 and Thunderbolt 4, allowing the computer to drive the 6K Pro Display XDR at full resolution.
 However, one possible downside: it appears this new MacBook Pro will only be available with 16 GB of RAM.
 The new MacBook Pro is available to order today, and will start shipping next week.

title: 苹果首次推出搭载M1的13.3英寸MacBook Pro，电池续航时间长达20小时，CPU速度提高2.8倍，ML速度提高11倍，GPU速度提高5倍，内存容量从1,299美元起，最高可达16 GB
title_en: Apple debuts 13.3" MacBook Pro with M1, up to 20 hours battery life, up to 2.8x faster CPU, 11x faster ML, and 5x faster GPU, and up to 16GB RAM, from $1,299

note:
苹果公司今天发布了第一款用于Mac的苹果硅处理器，名为M1芯片。
M1芯片有一个八核CPU，有四个高性能内核，苹果称之为世界上最快的CPU内核。其他四个内核都是高效率的内核，耗电量只有它的十分之一，同时还能提供高性能。苹果公司表示，M1提供了最佳的CPU性能功耗比。
M1的显卡集成了多达8个内核的GPU，苹果公司表示，M1集成显卡的速度是世界上最快的。该芯片还包含一个每秒可处理11万亿次运算的六核神经引擎，以及苹果的安全飞地。
M1也采用与A14仿生芯片相同的5纳米制程，支持迅雷和USB4。

note_en:
Apple has today announced the first  Apple Silicon processor for the Mac titled the "M1" chip.
  The M1 chip has an eight-core CPU, with four high-performance cores, in what Apple calls "the world's fastest CPU core." The other four cores are high-efficiency cores that use one-tenth of the power while still delivering high performance. Apple says that M1 delivers the best CPU performance per watt.
  The M1 has integrated graphics with GPU containing up to eight cores, and Apple says the M1 contains the world's fastest integrated graphics. The chip also contains a six-core neural engine that can process 11 trillion operations per second, as well as Apple's Secure Enclave.
 M1 is also built on the same five-nanometer process as the A14 Bionic chip, and supports Thunderbolt and USB 4.
 This story is part of our coverage of Apple's ongoing "One More Thing" event today. Refresh for more details and  follow along with our live blog for the latest updates. We're also live  tweeting the event on Twitter.
 I can't wait to see how some of the claims stack up in in testing.

title: MacRumors

note:
苹果公司今天推出了一款新的MacBook Air，这是它的第一款Mac电脑，配备了被称为M1芯片的定制苹果硅处理器。新的MacBook Air比上一代MacBook Air快3.5倍，GPU性能快5倍。
CPU速度提高3.5倍，显卡速度提高5倍，固态硬盘速度提高2倍。
新款MacBook Air标志着苹果开始在Mac电脑上摆脱英特尔处理器。早在6月份，苹果就公布了开始在Mac电脑中使用自己定制的苹果硅处理器的计划，承诺提供行业领先的每瓦性能。当时，苹果表示，过渡将需要大约两年时间才能完成。
在此期间，苹果取笑了正在开发中的基于英特尔(Intel)的新Mac，包括8月份发布的更新后的27英寸iMac。苹果公司表示，在未来几年内，它将继续支持和发布适用于基于英特尔的Mac电脑的新版MacOS。
这篇报道是我们今天对苹果正在进行的另一件事的报道的一部分。请刷新以获取更多详细信息，并关注我们的现场博客以获取最新更新。我们还在推特上直播了这一活动。
我会怀念风扇的：现在我们不知道Mac是否在努力工作了。
呵呵，我想苹果从现在开始会一直使用他们自己的芯片。他们的自尊心不会让他们再转行，即使比方说10-15年后，他们最终会落后于硅业竞争。不过，这是一个完全不同的问题。我想知道，在推出配备M1硅片的Mac电脑时，会不会有某种官方的Boot Camp支持？哦，是的，我是说运行在M1芯片上的ARM操作系统。是的，在本地(非虚拟)运行它。疯狂？不用谢。尽管需要合适的集成GPU驱动程序。引导加载程序应该允许双引导设置，就像它目前对英特尔所做的那样。我是Boot Camp的活跃驱动程序开发人员，因此我确信：Mac(Book)上的Windows用户社区太大了，不容忽视。因此，要么他们(AAPL/MSFT)很快这么做，要么我们(极客/开发人员)以后再做。只是大声地想一想：)。
在未来的几年里支持英特尔。我经历了从购买力平价到英特尔的过渡。到2007年年中，在WWDC宣布还不到两年的时间里，在PowerPC上获得软件更新是闻所未闻的。
哇，真不敢相信他们把昂贵的英特尔芯片换成了自己的ARM芯片，而且价格不变。这些产品的利润率肯定高得离谱，即使对苹果来说也是如此。

note_en:
Apple today introduced a new MacBook Air as its first Mac with a custom Apple Silicon processor known as the M1 chip. The new MacBook Air is up to 3.5x faster than the previous-generation MacBook Air, with up to 5x faster GPU performance.
  Up to 3.5x faster CPU, up to 5x faster graphics, and up to 2x faster SSD
 The new MacBook Air marks the beginning of Apple's transition away from Intel processors in Macs. Back in June, Apple revealed its plans to begin using its own custom Apple Silicon processors in Macs, promising industry-leading performance per watt. At the time, Apple said that the transition would take about two years to be completed.
 In the interim, Apple teased new Intel-based Macs in development, including an updated 27-inch iMac released in August. Apple said that it will continue to support and release new versions of macOS for Intel-based Macs for years to come.
 This story is part of our coverage of Apple's ongoing "One More Thing" event today. Refresh for more details and  follow along with our live blog for the latest updates. We're also  live tweeting the event on Twitter.
 I'm going to miss the Fan : Now we won't know if the Mac is working hard or not.
  He he, I think Apple will from now on keep using their own chips forever and ever. Their ego will not let them switch anymore, even if in, say, 10-15 years they are eventually behind the silicon competition.  Totally different question, though... I wonder will there be some sort of official Boot Camp support at launch of Macs with M1 silicon? Oh yes, I mean Windows for ARM running on M1 chip. And yes, running it natively (non-virtually). Crazy? Not at all. Although proper integrated GPU driver is needed. And bootloader should allow dual-boot setup, as it does currently with Intel.  I'm an active driver dev for Boot Camp, so I'm sure: Windows user community on a Mac(Book) is too large to be ignored. So either they (AAPL/MSFT) do it soon, or we (geeks/devs) have to do it later. Just thinking out loud :)
 "Support Intel for years to come"...  I lived the PPC to Intel transition. By Mid 2007 it was unheard of to get software updates on PowerPC stuff, less than 2 years after the WWDC announcement.
 Wow, can’t believe they switched from expensive Intel chips to their own ARM chips and kept the price the same. The profit margin on these must be insane, even for Apple.

title_en: Apple debuts M1-powered 13.3-inch MacBook Air without a fan, 3.5x better CPU performance, up to 18 hour video playback, and updated webcam, starting at $999

note:
苹果公司表示，将于11月12日发布名为Big Sur的MacOS 11.0。该公司在6月份的开发者大会上首次宣布了新的操作系统，并在8月份以公开测试版的形式发布了它。这将是第一款支持苹果新的M1笔记本电脑芯片的MacOS操作系统。一旦你下载了新的免费更新，你很可能会立即注意到设计和美学上的变化，其中许多变化来自iOS。
例如，Big Sur配备了一个可定制的控制中心，您可以在其中切换亮度、请勿打扰和其他您选择的设置。它还包括一个新的通知中心，它可以将你所有的通知和小工具(也是重新设计的，在App Store中可用)保存在一栏中，根据哪些是最新的警报进行排序，并将相关通知分组在一起。两个接口都是半透明的，就像IOS一样。其他变化包括更高的菜单栏、基于桌面背景的字体颜色更改以及更透明的窗口。
邮件(Mail)和照片(Photos)等一些应用程序也在接收设计更新，新版Mac地图正在随操作系统一起发布。这一更新功能包括定制指南、360度位置视图、自行车和电动汽车方向(可以直接发送到iPhone)、共享ETA、拥堵区域和室内地图的实时更新。
除了设计上的改变，Big Sur还包括以隐私为重点的功能，比如Safari的更新名为隐私报告(Privacy Report)，它列出了浏览器在过去30天里屏蔽的跨站追踪器，还有一个密码监控工具，如果Safari检测到你保存的任何密码涉及数据泄露，它可以帮助你升级到安全密码。Big Sur的App Store现在还将包括应用程序可能收集的数据类型，以及这些数据是否被分享给第三方进行跟踪。
最后，苹果还表示，Mac电脑的屏幕在打开时会立即打开，就像iPhone在拿起时会亮起一样。
还有更多的更新，你可以在这里阅读完整的内容，并在11月12日体验自己。
note_en:
Apple says it’ll release macOS 11.0, dubbed  Big Sur, on November 12th. The company first announced the new OS at its developer’s conference in June and released it as a public beta in August. This will be the first macOS to support Apple’s  new M1 laptop chip. Once you download the new, free update, you’ll most likely immediately note the design and aesthetic changes, many taken from iOS.
 For one, Big Sur comes with a customizable Control Center where you can toggle brightness, Do Not Disturb, and other settings of your choice. It also includes a new notification center that’ll keep all of your notifications and widgets (also redesigned and available in the App Store) in one column, sort alerts by which are most recent, and group related notifications together. Both interfaces are translucent, just like iOS. Other changes include taller menu bars, font color changes based on the desktop background, and more translucent windows.
 Some apps, like Mail and Photos, are also receiving design updates, and a new version of Maps for Mac is shipping along with the OS. That update features custom Guides, 360-degree location views, bicycle and electric-vehicle directions (which you can send directly to an iPhone), live updates for shared ETAs, congestion zones, and indoor maps.
 In addition to design changes, Big Sur includes privacy-focused features, like an update to Safari called Privacy Report that lists cross-site trackers the browser has blocked over the last 30 days, as well as a password-monitoring tool through which Safari helps you upgrade to secure passwords if it detects that any of your saved passwords have been involved in a data breach. Big Sur’s App Store will also now include the types of data apps might collect and whether the data are shared with third parties for tracking.
 Finally, Apple also says Macs’ screens will turn on immediately when they’re opened, similarly to how the iPhone lights up when it’s picked up.
 There’s a whole lot more to the update, which you can read about in full  here and experience yourself on November 12th.
title: 苹果称MacOS Big Sur将于11月12日上市
title_en: Apple says macOS Big Sur will be available on November 12

note:
加利福尼亚州库比蒂诺--在Mac的一个重要日子里，苹果公司(Apple)今天推出了一款新的MacBook Air、13英寸MacBook Pro，以及搭载革命性的M1的Mac mini，这是苹果专门为Mac设计的芯片系列中的第一款。到目前为止，M1是苹果制造的最强大的芯片，它改变了Mac的体验。凭借业界领先的性能功耗比，再加上MacOS Big Sur，M1的CPU速度提高了3.5倍，GPU速度提高了6倍，机器学习(ML)能力提高了15倍，电池续航时间延长了2倍。有了M1和Big Sur，用户就可以获得有史以来最大的Mac应用程序集合。凭借令人惊叹的性能和卓越的新功能，采用M1技术的Mac电脑新产品阵容超值，现在所有产品都可以订购。
苹果首席执行官蒂姆·库克表示：“三款采用苹果突破性M1芯片的新Mac的推出，代表着酝酿多年的大胆变革，标志着Mac和苹果真正具有历史意义的一天。”M1是迄今为止我们开发出的最强大的芯片，与Big Sur相结合，提供了令人惊叹的性能、非凡的电池续航时间以及比以往更多的软件和应用程序。我们迫不及待地想让我们的客户体验这一新一代Mac，我们毫不怀疑这将帮助他们继续改变世界。“。
MacBook Air是苹果最受欢迎的Mac电脑，也是全球最畅销的13英寸笔记本电脑。有了M1芯片，MacBook Air可以快速完成从编辑家庭照片到将视频输出到网络的所有工作。强大的8核CPU比上一代处理器的运行速度快3.5倍。配备高达8核的GPU，显卡速度提高了5倍，这是MacBook Air有史以来最大的飞跃，因此身临其境的图形密集型游戏运行的帧速率要高得多。多语言工作负载的速度高达9倍，所以使用人脸识别或物体检测等基于多语言功能的应用程序可以在很短的时间内做到这一点。M1芯片的存储控制器和最新的闪存技术提供了高达2倍的固态硬盘性能，因此预览海量图像或导入大文件的速度比以往任何时候都要快。在MacBook Air中，M1的速度超过了去年销售的98%的PC笔记本电脑的芯片。1个。
凭借业界领先的M1能效，MacBook Air也以无风扇设计提供了这一性能，这意味着无论用户在做什么，它都保持完全安静。新款MacBook Air拥有超凡的电池续航时间，可支持长达15小时的无线网页浏览和长达18小时的视频播放--这是MacBook Air有史以来最长的续航时间。2个。
与上一代产品相比，搭载M1处理器的MacBook Air首次能够在Final Cut Pro中播放和编辑多个全画质的4K ProRes视频流，而不会丢弃任何一帧。
使用Final Cut Pro中基于ML的功能(如Final Cut Pro中的Smart Conform)，可以智能地为剪辑添加边框，速度最高可达4.3倍。
电池续航时间长达18小时，是MacBook Air有史以来续航时间最长的一次，可以观看更多电影和电视节目。
一次充电可以延长FaceTime和其他视频通话时间的两倍。
MacBook Air的其他新功能包括苹果最新的M1芯片图像信号处理器(ISP)，它通过更好的降噪、更大的动态范围、改进的自动白平衡和增强的面部检测来提高相机图像质量，使用户在视频通话中看起来最好。对P3宽色的支持使Retina显示屏更具活力，栩栩如生。M1的安全飞地与Big Sur相结合，通过Touch ID等功能提供了一流的安全性，这使得只需手指触摸，就可以轻松解锁MacBook Air，并使用Apple Pay进行安全的在线购物。Wi-Fi 6提供更快的无线性能，而两个支持USB 4的迅雷端口可以连接到各种外围设备。
凭借其时尚的楔形设计，令人惊叹的视网膜显示屏，魔术键盘，以及M1带来的惊人性能，新款MacBook Air再次重新定义了轻薄笔记本的功能。而且它仍然只有999美元，教育费用也只有899美元。
13英寸的MacBook Pro是苹果最受欢迎的专业笔记本。学生用它来完成大学学业，专业人士用它来引导他们的创造力。有了M1芯片和Big Sur，13英寸的MacBook Pro变得更加强大和专业。与MacBook Pro的主动冷却系统配合使用时，8核CPU的速度比上一代快2.8倍，在编译代码、转码视频、编辑高分辨率照片等方面提供了改变游戏规则的性能。8核GPU的速度最高可达5倍，无论是设计图形密集型游戏还是新产品，都能让用户享受超级流畅的图形性能。使用M1，13英寸的MacBook Pro比同类最畅销的Windows笔记本电脑快3倍。3ML的速度高达11倍，对于使用神经引擎的设备上的ML任务，新的13英寸MacBook Pro现在是世界上速度最快的紧凑型Pro笔记本。4 MacBook Pro拥有长达17小时的无线网页浏览和高达20小时的视频播放，电池续航时间是上一代的两倍，是Mac上最长的电池续航时间。2个。
与上一代相比，M1驱动的13英寸MacBook Pro可以：在djay Pro AI中实时将节拍、乐器和声道从录音中分离出来，这要归功于神经引擎令人惊叹的性能。
由于M1芯片具有改变游戏规则的每瓦特性能，一次充电可以编译四倍的代码。
新的13英寸MacBook Pro的其他新功能包括录音棚品质的麦克风，可用于超级清晰的录音和通话，苹果最新的M1芯片摄像头ISP可以在视频通话的阴影和亮点中提供更清晰的图像和更多的细节。新款MacBook Pro还通过M1和Touch ID的Secure Enclave提供了一流的安全性。它配备了两个支持USB 4的迅雷端口，可以连接比以往更多的外设，包括全6K分辨率的苹果Pro Display XDR。
凭借其令人惊叹的性能和令人难以置信的电池续航能力，再加上华丽的Retina显示屏、魔术键盘和3磅的紧凑设计，新款13英寸MacBook Pro是M1芯片功能的终极体现。它的起价仅为1,299美元，教育起价为1,199美元。
Mac mini是苹果最多功能的电脑，现在有了M1，它在如此紧凑的设计中提供了惊人的性能和令人难以置信的新功能。M1配备了8核CPU，性能比上一代快3倍，极大地加速了苛刻的工作负载，从编译一百万行代码到构建庞大的多轨音乐项目。8核GPU可将图形性能大幅提升6倍，使Mac mini能够轻松处理复杂的3D渲染等性能密集型任务。与上一代产品相比，ML工作负载的性能也实现了飞跃，性能提高了15倍。与价格范围内最畅销的Windows台式机相比，Mac mini的尺寸只有它的十分之一，但性能却提高了5倍。5个
与上一代相比，搭载M1处理器的Mac mini可以：玩一款图形密集型游戏，比如《古墓丽影》(Shadow Of The Tomb Raider)，帧速率最高可提高4倍。
在Logic Pro中使用多达3倍的实时插件，将音乐制作提升到一个新的水平。
Mac mini还采用了先进的散热设计，在保持凉爽和安静的同时保持其突破性的性能，支持多达两个显示器，包括全6K分辨率的Apple Pro Display XDR和Wi-Fi 6，以实现更快的无线性能，以及M1中的安全飞地，以实现一流的安全性。
有了M1和Big Sur，Mac mini代表着超小型台式机所能做的巨大转变。Mac mini的功能和功能比以往任何时候都多得多，现在只需699美元，比上一代四核机型低了100美元。
所有新款Mac都配备了Big Sur，这是世界上最先进的桌面操作系统的最新版本。Big Sur引入了一个漂亮的重新设计，这是一个全新而又立即熟悉的设计，并对Safari、Messages和Maps等应用程序进行了强大的更新。Big Sur经过精心设计，其核心是充分利用M1的所有能力和动力，大幅提升性能、惊人的电池续航时间，并提供更强大的安全保护。有了M1，用户每天做的事情感觉明显更快、更流畅。就像iPhone和iPad一样，Mac现在可以立即从睡眠中醒来。Safari已经是世界上速度最快的浏览器，现在使用Safari浏览，运行JavaScript的速度提高了1.5倍，响应速度提高了近2倍。6个。
有了Big Sur和M1，Mac用户可以运行比以往更多的应用程序。苹果的所有Mac软件现在都是通用的，并在M1系统上本地运行。尚未更新到Universal的现有Mac应用程序将与苹果的Rosetta 2技术无缝运行。IPhone和iPad应用程序现在可以直接在Mac上运行。此外，Big Sur的基础经过优化以释放M1的能力，包括从用于图形的Metal到用于机器学习的Core ML的开发技术。
1984年，苹果推出了Macintosh，给个人技术带来了革命性的变化。如今，苹果凭借iPhone、iPad、Mac、Apple Watch和Apple TV引领世界创新。苹果的五个软件平台-iOS、iPadOS、MacOS、WatchOS和TVOS-在所有苹果设备上提供无缝体验，并为人们提供突破性的服务，包括App Store、Apple Music、Apple Pay和iCloud。苹果的10万多名员工致力于制造世界上最好的产品，并致力于让世界变得比我们发现的更好。
苹果在2020年10月进行了测试，使用的是预产的13英寸MacBook Pro系统，配备Apple M1芯片和16 GB内存。使用精选的行业标准基准来衡量性能。来自过去12个月公开销售数据的PC配置。性能测试是使用特定的计算机系统进行的，反映了MacBook Pro的大致性能。
苹果在2020年10月进行了测试，使用的是预生产的搭载Apple M1芯片的13英寸MacBook Pro系统，以及生产的基于Intel Core i7、配备Intel Iris Plus显卡的PC系统，以及测试时可用的最新版本的Windows 10。基于过去九个月公开销售数据的畅销系统。在商业应用程序中测试图形密集型工作负载。性能测试是使用特定的计算机系统进行的，反映了MacBook Pro的大致性能。
苹果在2020年10月进行的测试使用了搭载Apple M1芯片的13英寸MacBook Pro系统的预生产，以及基于英特尔酷睿i7的独立显卡个人电脑系统的试产，其定义为拥有高性能显卡、重量在3.1磅或更小、厚度在0.85英寸或更小的笔记本电脑。在每个平台上使用预先训练好的卷积神经网络模型和优化框架进行测试。性能测试通常使用特定的计算机系统进行，并反映MacBook Pro最接近的性能。
苹果于2020年10月使用配备Apple M1芯片的试生产Mac Mini系统，以及基于英特尔酷睿i5、英特尔超高清显卡630和测试时可用的最新Windows 10版本的生产PC系统进行了测试。基于过去九个月公开销售数据的畅销系统。使用精选的行业标准显卡基准进行测试。性能测试是使用特定的计算机系统进行的，反映了Mac mini的大致性能。
“世界上最快的浏览器”：苹果公司于2020年8月和10月在完成测试的浏览器上使用JetStream 2、MotionMark1.1和Speedeter 2.0性能基准进行了测试。测试时在预发行Safari 14和最新稳定版本的Chrome、Firefox和(Windows)Microsoft Edge上进行了测试，安装在基于英特尔酷睿i5的13英寸MacBook Pro系统(预发行MacOS Big Sur和在Boot Camp中运行的Windows 10 Home)；12.9英寸iPad Pro(第四代)，预发行iPadOS 14和基于英特尔酷睿i7的Microsoft Surface Pro 7系统(Windows 10 Pro)；iPhone 11 Pro Max(预发行iOS 14和三星Galaxy S20 Ultra)。性能将根据使用情况、系统配置、网络连接和其他因素而有所不同。“运行JavaScript的速度高达1.5倍，响应速度快近2倍”：苹果在2020年9月和10月使用JetStream2和Speedeter 2.0性能基准进行了测试。在预生产的MacBook Air和Mac迷你系统上进行了测试，这些系统配备了Apple M1芯片和8核GPU，以及生产的1.2 GHz四核英特尔酷睿i7 13英寸MacBook Air系统和3.6 GHz四核英特尔酷睿i3 Mac迷你系统，所有这些系统都配置了16 GB RAM、2TB固态硬盘和预发行的MacOS Big Sur。使用预发布的Safari 14.0.1和WPA2 Wi-Fi网络连接进行测试。性能将根据系统配置、网络配置、网络连接和其他因素而有所不同。
note_en:
Cupertino, California — On a momentous day for the Mac, Apple today introduced a new MacBook Air, 13-inch MacBook Pro, and Mac mini powered by the revolutionary  M1, the first in a family of chips designed by Apple specifically for the Mac. By far the most powerful chip Apple has ever made, M1 transforms the Mac experience. With its industry-leading performance per watt, together with macOS Big Sur, M1 delivers up to 3.5x faster CPU, up to 6x faster GPU, up to 15x faster machine learning (ML) capabilities, and battery life up to 2x longer than before. And with M1 and Big Sur, users get access to the biggest collection of apps ever for Mac. With amazing performance and remarkable new features, the new lineup of M1-powered Macs are an incredible value, and all are available to order today.
  “The introduction of three new Macs featuring Apple’s breakthrough M1 chip represents a bold change that was years in the making, and marks a truly historic day for the Mac and for Apple,” said Tim Cook, Apple’s CEO. “M1 is by far the most powerful chip we’ve ever created, and combined with Big Sur, delivers mind-blowing performance, extraordinary battery life, and access to more software and apps than ever before. We can’t wait for our customers to experience this new generation of Mac, and we have no doubt it will help them continue to change the world.”
    MacBook Air is Apple’s most popular Mac and the world’s best-selling 13-inch notebook. With the M1 chip, MacBook Air speeds through everything from editing family photos to exporting videos for the web. The powerful 8-core CPU performs up to 3.5x faster than the previous generation. With up to an 8-core GPU, graphics are up to 5x faster, the biggest leap ever for MacBook Air, so immersive, graphics-intensive games run at significantly higher frame rates. ML workloads are up to 9x faster, so apps that use ML-based features like face recognition or object detection can do so in a fraction of the time. The M1 chip’s storage controller and latest flash technology deliver up to 2x faster SSD performance, so previewing massive images or importing large files is faster than ever. And in MacBook Air, M1 is faster than the chips in 98 percent of PC laptops sold in the past year. 1
  With the industry-leading power efficiency of M1, MacBook Air also delivers this performance in a fanless design, which means no matter what users are doing, it remains completely silent. And the new MacBook Air features extraordinary battery life, with up to 15 hours of wireless web browsing and up to 18 hours of video playback — the longest battery life ever on a MacBook Air. 2
    When compared to the previous generation, the M1-powered MacBook Air can:  For the first time, play back and edit multiple streams of full-quality, 4K ProRes video in Final Cut Pro without dropping a frame.
  Use ML-based features like Smart Conform in Final Cut Pro to intelligently frame a clip up to 4.3x faster.
 Watch more movies and TV shows with up to 18 hours of battery life, the longest ever on MacBook Air.
 Extend FaceTime and other video calls for up to twice as long on a single charge.
    Other new features in MacBook Air include Apple’s latest image signal processor (ISP) in the M1 chip, which improves camera image quality with better noise reduction, greater dynamic range, and improved auto white balance and ML-enhanced face detection so users look their best during video calls. Support for P3 wide color results in an even more vibrant, true-to-life Retina display. The Secure Enclave in M1, combined with Big Sur, delivers best-in-class security with features like Touch ID, which makes it easy to unlock MacBook Air and make secure online purchases using Apple Pay with the touch of a finger. And Wi-Fi 6 delivers faster wireless performance, while two Thunderbolt ports with USB 4 support allow for connectivity to a wide range of peripherals.
  With its sleek wedge-shaped design, stunning Retina display, Magic Keyboard, and astonishing level of performance thanks to M1, the new MacBook Air once again redefines what a thin and light notebook can do. And it is still just $999, and $899 for education.
    The 13-inch MacBook Pro is Apple’s most popular pro notebook. Students use it to power through college, and pros use it to channel their creativity. With the M1 chip and Big Sur, the 13-inch MacBook Pro becomes even more powerful and even more pro. The 8-core CPU, when paired with the MacBook Pro’s active cooling system, is up to 2.8x faster than the previous generation, delivering game-changing performance when compiling code, transcoding video, editing high-resolution photos, and more. The 8-core GPU is up to 5x faster, allowing users to enjoy super smooth graphics performance whether they are designing a graphics-intensive game or a new product. And with M1, the 13-inch MacBook Pro is up to 3x faster than the best-selling Windows laptop in its class. 3 ML is up to 11x faster, and for on-device ML tasks that use the Neural Engine, the new 13-inch MacBook Pro is now the world’s fastest compact pro notebook. 4 With up to 17 hours of wireless web browsing and up to a staggering 20 hours of video playback, MacBook Pro delivers up to twice the battery life of the previous generation and the longest battery life ever on a Mac. 2
    When compared to the previous generation, the M1-powered 13-inch MacBook Pro can: Separate out beats, instrumentals, and vocal tracks from a recording in real time in djay Pro AI, thanks to the amazing performance of the Neural Engine.
  Compile four times as much code on a single charge, thanks to the game-changing performance per watt of the M1 chip.
    Other new features in the new 13-inch MacBook Pro include studio-quality mics for super clear recordings and calls, and Apple’s latest camera ISP in the M1 chip enables sharper images and more detail in shadows and highlights on video calls. The new MacBook Pro also delivers best-in-class security with the Secure Enclave in M1 and Touch ID. And it features two Thunderbolt ports with USB 4 support to connect to more peripherals than ever, including Apple’s Pro Display XDR in full 6K resolution.
  With its amazing performance and unbelievable battery life, combined with its gorgeous Retina display, Magic Keyboard, and 3-pound compact design, the new 13-inch MacBook Pro is the ultimate expression of what the M1 chip can do. And it is available for the same starting price of just $1,299, and $1,199 for education.
    Mac mini is Apple’s most versatile computer, and now with M1, it packs a staggering amount of performance and incredible new features in such a compact design. M1 brings an 8-core CPU with up to 3x faster performance than the previous generation, dramatically accelerating demanding workloads, from compiling a million lines of code to building enormous multitrack music projects. An 8-core GPU delivers up to a massive 6x increase in graphics performance, allowing Mac mini to tackle performance-intensive tasks like complex 3D rendering with ease. ML workloads also take a quantum leap forward with up to 15x faster performance over the previous generation. And when compared to the best-selling Windows desktop in its price range, the Mac mini is just one-tenth the size, yet delivers up to 5x faster performance. 5
    When compared to the previous generation, the M1-powered Mac mini can: Play a graphics-intensive game like “Shadow of the Tomb Raider” with up to 4x higher frame rates.
  Take music production to new levels by using up to 3x as many real-time plug-ins in Logic Pro.
    Mac mini also features an advanced thermal design to sustain its breakthrough performance while staying cool and quiet, support for up to two displays including Apple’s Pro Display XDR in full 6K resolution, and Wi-Fi 6 for faster wireless performance and the Secure Enclave in M1 for best-in-class security.
  With M1 and Big Sur, Mac mini represents a massive shift in what an ultrasmall desktop can do. Far more versatile and far more capable than ever, Mac mini is now available for just $699, $100 less than the previous-generation quad-core model.
    All new Macs come with Big Sur, the latest version of the world’s most advanced desktop operating system. Big Sur introduces a beautiful redesign that is entirely new yet instantly familiar, and powerful updates to apps including Safari, Messages, and Maps. Big Sur is engineered, down to its core, to take full advantage of all the capability and power of M1, delivering a massive boost in performance, astonishing battery life, and even stronger security protections. With M1, things users do every day feel noticeably faster and smoother. Just like iPhone and iPad, the Mac now instantly wakes from sleep. Browsing with Safari — which is already the world’s fastest browser — is now up to 1.5x speedier at running JavaScript and nearly 2x more responsive. 6
  With Big Sur and M1, Mac users can run a greater range of apps than ever before. All of Apple’s Mac software is now Universal and runs natively for M1 systems. Existing Mac apps that have not been updated to Universal will run seamlessly with Apple’s Rosetta 2 technology. And iPhone and iPad apps can now run directly on the Mac. Additionally, the foundations of Big Sur are optimized to unlock the power of M1, including developer technologies from Metal for graphics to Core ML for machine learning.
          Apple revolutionized personal technology with the introduction of the Macintosh in 1984. Today, Apple leads the world in innovation with iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, and Apple TV. Apple’s five software platforms — iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS — provide seamless experiences across all Apple devices and empower people with breakthrough services including the App Store, Apple Music, Apple Pay, and iCloud. Apple’s more than 100,000 employees are dedicated to making the best products on earth, and to leaving the world better than we found it.

PC configurations from publicly available sales data over the last 12 months. Performance tests are conducted using specific computer systems and reflect the approximate performance of MacBook Pro.
  Testing conducted by Apple in October 2020 using preproduction 13-inch MacBook Pro systems with Apple M1 chip, as well as production Intel Core i7-based PC systems with Intel Iris Plus Graphics and the latest version of Windows 10 available at the time of testing. Best-selling system based on publicly available sales data over the last nine months. Tested with graphics-intensive workloads in commercial applications. Performance tests are conducted using specific computer systems and reflect the approximate performance of MacBook Pro.
 Testing conducted by Apple in October 2020 using preproduction 13-inch MacBook Pro systems with Apple M1 chip, as well as production Intel Core i7-based PC systems with discrete graphics. Compact pro notebook defined as a notebook with high-performance graphics, weight of 3.1 pounds or less, and thickness of 0.85 inches or less. Tested with pre-trained Convolutional Neural Network models and optimized frameworks on each platform. Performance tests are conducted using specific computer systems and reflect the approximate performance of MacBook Pro.
 Testing conducted by Apple in October 2020 using preproduction Mac mini systems with Apple M1 chip, as well as production Intel Core i5-based PC systems with Intel UHD Graphics 630 and the latest version of Windows 10 available at the time of testing. Best-selling system based on publicly available sales data over the last nine months. Tested with select industry-standard graphics benchmarks. Performance tests are conducted using specific computer systems and reflect the approximate performance of Mac mini.
 “World’s fastest browser”: Testing conducted by Apple in August and October 2020 using JetStream 2, MotionMark 1.1, and Speedometer 2.0 performance benchmarks on browsers that completed the test. Tested with prerelease Safari 14 and latest stable versions of Chrome, Firefox, and (Windows) Microsoft Edge at the time of testing, on Intel Core i5-based 13-inch MacBook Pro systems with prerelease macOS Big Sur and Windows 10 Home running in Boot Camp; 12.9-inch iPad Pro (4th generation) units with prerelease iPadOS 14 and Intel Core i7-based Microsoft Surface Pro 7 systems with Windows 10 Pro; and iPhone 11 Pro Max with prerelease iOS 14 and Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra with Android 10. Devices tested with a WPA2 Wi-Fi network connection. Tested with prerelease Safari 14.0.1 and WPA2 Wi-Fi network connection. Performance will vary based on system configuration, network configuration, network connection, and other factors.
title: 下一代Mac

note: 我们依赖您的支持：您知道您每月只需不到3美元就可以获得Phoronix Premium吗？今天就试着在一个页面上查看我们的网站无广告、多页文章，以及更多内容，这样我们就可以写更多的Linux硬件评论了。对于那些使用Qt 5.12LTS系列的用户，Qt 5.12.10点版本今天发布了30个新的错误修复。但对于那些展望Qt6的人来说，今天还推出了Qt6.0Beta4。Qt 5.12.10详细信息可以在Qt.io上找到。这个最新的POINT版本的变化包括各种错误修复、可能的堆损坏情况、一些Qt应用程序无法播放GIF的问题、不一致的XPM处理以及其他问题。同时，为了展望未来，还有Qt6.0Beta4作为Qt6工具包的最新开发版本。这个新的测试版自始至终都有许多修复，各种CMake构建系统调整，文档改进，以及对这个多平台工具包的大量代码库的其他修复/更正。就目前而言，Qt6.0的目标仍然是在12月发布。如果一切顺利，Qt 6.0候选版本最早可能在下周发布，官方发布大约在12月初。但由于早些时候发布过程中出现了一些延迟，目前还不清楚这些日期是否能如期完成，但至少看起来QT 6.0.0仍能在2020年发货。Qt 6.0带来了许多Quick 3D改进和其他图形堆栈更改、用于附加库的包管理器、下一代QML支持、工具改进、主机/平台更新等等。Qt 6.0确实删除了Qt脚本，也删除了Qt多媒体/Qt蓝牙/Qt虚拟键盘模块，直到更高的Qt6版本。
note_en: We Rely On Your Support: Did you know that you can get  Phoronix Premium for under $3 per month? Try it today to view our site  ad-free, multi-page articles on a single page, and more while the proceeds allow us to write more Linux hardware reviews.   For those on the Qt 5.12 LTS series the Qt 5.12.10 point release is out today with 30 new bug fixes. But for those looking ahead to  Qt 6 also out today is Qt 6.0 Beta 4.   Qt 5.12.10 details can be found on  Qt.io. Among the changes for this latest point release are various error fixes, a possible heap corruption scenario, an issue with GIFs not playing in some Qt applications, inconsistent XPM handling, and other problems.   Meanwhile for looking ahead there is also  Qt 6.0 Beta 4 as the newest development release of the Qt6 tool-kit. This new beta has many fixes throughout, various CMake build system adjustments, documentation improvements, and other fixes/corrections to the massive code-base for this multi-platform toolkit.   As it stands now Qt 6.0 is still aiming for release in December. If all goes well the Qt 6.0 release candidate could be out as soon as next week and the official release around the start of December. But as there has been some delays in the release process earlier on, it's not clear if those dates will be met but at least it's looking like Qt 6.0.0 should still be able to ship in 2020.   Qt 6.0 brings  many Quick 3D improvements and other  graphics stack changes,  a package manager for extra libraries, next-generation QML support, tooling improvements, host/platform updates, and more.   Qt 6.0 does drop Qt Script and also removes Qt Multimedia / Qt Bluetooth / Qt Virtual-Keyboard modules until a later Qt6 version.
title: Qt 6.0 Beta 4发布

加利福尼亚州库比蒂诺-苹果公司(Apple)今天发布了M1，这是苹果有史以来最强大的芯片，也是第一款专门为Mac设计的芯片。M1针对Mac系统进行了优化，在Mac系统中，小型化和能效至关重要。作为片上系统(SoC)，M1将众多功能强大的技术整合到单个芯片中，并采用统一的存储架构来显著提高性能和效率。M1是第一款采用尖端5纳米制程技术制造的个人电脑芯片，其晶体管数量高达惊人的160亿个，是苹果有史以来投入芯片最多的一款芯片。它拥有世界上最快的低功耗硅CPU内核，世界上最好的CPU性能功耗比，世界上最快的个人电脑集成显卡，以及苹果神经引擎突破性的机器学习性能。因此，M1的CPU性能提高了3.5倍，GPU性能提高了6倍，机器学习速度提高了15倍，电池续航时间比上一代Mac延长了2倍。随着性能和效率的大幅提升，M1为Mac带来了有史以来最大的飞跃。1个。
他说：“从来没有像M1这样的芯片，这是我们针对Mac的突破性SoC。它建立在十多年来为iPhone、iPad和Apple Watch设计业界领先芯片的基础上，并开启了Mac的一个全新时代，“苹果硬件技术高级副总裁约翰尼·斯劳吉(Johny Srouji)说。说到低功耗硅，M1拥有世界上最快的CPU内核，世界上最快的个人电脑集成显卡，以及苹果神经引擎令人惊叹的机器学习性能。凭借其卓越的性能、强大的功能和难以置信的效率的独特组合，M1是我们迄今为止创造的最好的芯片。“。
传统上，Mac和PC在CPU、I/O、安全等方面使用多个芯片。现在有了M1，这些技术被整合到一个SoC中，提供了一个全新的集成水平，以实现更高的性能和能效。M1还具有统一的内存架构，该架构将高带宽、低延迟的内存整合到一个定制包中的单个池中。这使得SoC中的所有技术都可以访问相同的数据，而无需在多个内存池之间复制数据，从而进一步提高了性能和效率。
M1采用8核CPU，由四个高性能核和四个高效率核组成。每个高性能内核为单线程任务提供业界领先的性能，同时尽可能高效地运行。它们是世界上最快的低功耗硅CPU内核，摄影师可以以闪电般的速度编辑高分辨率的照片，开发人员开发应用程序的速度几乎是以前的3倍。而且这四种线程都可以一起使用，从而极大地提升多线程性能。
四个高能效内核以十分之一的功率提供卓越的性能。这四个内核本身的性能与当前一代的双核MacBook Air相似，但功耗要低得多。它们是运行轻量级日常任务(如查看电子邮件或浏览网页)的最有效方式，并且前所未有地延长了电池续航时间。所有8个内核都可以协同工作，为要求最苛刻的任务提供难以置信的计算能力，并提供世界上最好的CPU性能功耗比。
M1包括苹果最先进的GPU。它得益于多年来对Mac应用程序的分析，包括日常应用程序和具有挑战性的专业工作负载。凭借业界领先的性能和难以置信的效率，M1中的GPU独占鳌头。GPU拥有多达8个强大的内核，能够同时运行近25,000个线程，可以轻松处理要求极其苛刻的任务，从流畅播放多个4K视频流到渲染复杂的3D场景。M1的吞吐量为2.6万亿次浮点，在个人计算机中拥有世界上最快的集成显卡。
M1芯片将苹果的神经引擎带到了Mac上，极大地加速了机器学习(ML)任务。M1中的神经引擎采用了苹果公司最先进的16核架构，每秒可进行11万亿次运算，使机器学习性能提高了15倍。事实上，整个M1芯片都是为擅长机器学习而设计的，在CPU中安装了ML加速器，并配备了强大的GPU，因此视频分析、语音识别和图像处理等任务的性能将在Mac上达到前所未有的水平。
苹果最新的图像信号处理器(ISP)，可实现更高质量的视频，具有更好的降噪效果、更大的动态范围和改进的自动白平衡。
配备AES加密硬件的高性能存储控制器，可实现更快、更安全的固态硬盘性能。
低功耗、高效率的媒体编码和解码引擎，可提供卓越的性能和更长的电池续航时间。
这款由苹果公司设计的迅雷控制器支持USB 4，传输速度高达40Gbps，并且与比以往任何时候都更多的外围设备兼容。
MacOS Big Sur经过精心设计，其核心是充分利用M1的所有功能和能力，大幅提升性能、惊人的电池续航时间以及更强大的安全保护。有了M1，用户每天做的事情感觉明显更快、更流畅。就像iPhone和iPad一样，Mac现在可以立即从睡眠中醒来。Safari已经是世界上速度最快的浏览器，现在使用Safari浏览，运行JavaScript的速度提高了1.5倍，响应速度提高了近2倍。2个。
有了Big Sur和M1，Mac用户可以运行比以往更多的应用程序。苹果的所有Mac软件现在都是通用的，并在M1系统上本地运行。尚未更新到Universal的现有Mac应用程序将与苹果的Rosetta 2技术无缝运行。IPhone和iPad应用程序现在可以直接在Mac上运行。此外，Big Sur的基础经过优化以释放M1的能力，包括从用于图形的Metal到用于机器学习的Core ML的开发技术。
M1为新款MacBook Air、13英寸MacBook Pro和Mac mini提供动力。他们加入了Mac产品线的其余部分，形成了有史以来最强大的Mac产品阵容。这是向专门为Mac设计的新芯片系列过渡的开始。向苹果硅的过渡将需要大约两年的时间才能完成，这三个系统是令人惊叹的第一步。
1984年，苹果推出了Macintosh，给个人技术带来了革命性的变化。如今，苹果凭借iPhone、iPad、Mac、Apple Watch和Apple TV引领世界创新。苹果的五个软件平台-iOS、iPadOS、MacOS、WatchOS和TVOS-在所有苹果设备上提供无缝体验，并为人们提供突破性的服务，包括App Store、Apple Music、Apple Pay和iCloud。苹果的10万多名员工致力于制造世界上最好的产品，并致力于让世界变得比我们发现的更好。
“世界上最快的低功耗硅CPU内核”：由苹果公司于2020年10月进行的测试，使用预生产的13英寸MacBook Pro系统，配备Apple M1芯片和16 GB RAM，测量来自选定的行业标准基准、商业应用和开源应用的工作负载的峰值单线程性能。与测试时市面上可买到的笔记本电脑的最高性能CPU进行比较。性能测试是使用特定的计算机系统进行的，反映了MacBook Pro的大致性能。“世界上最好的CPU性能功耗比”：由苹果公司在2020年10月进行的测试，使用的是预产的13英寸MacBook Pro系统，配备Apple M1芯片和16 GB的RAM。性能功耗比是指使用特定行业标准基准的峰值CPU性能与平均功耗的比率。与测试时市面上销售的笔记本和台式机高性能CPU进行了比较。性能测试是使用特定的计算机系统进行的，反映了MacBook Pro的大致性能。“世界上最快的个人电脑集成显卡”：由苹果公司于2020年10月进行的测试，使用预生产的13英寸MacBook Pro系统，采用Apple M1芯片和16 GB RAM，使用精选的行业标准基准。与测试时市面上销售的笔记本和台式机的最高性能集成GPU进行了比较。集成GPU被定义为位于一个单片硅芯片上的GPU，以及一个CPU和内存控制器，位于一个统一的内存子系统后面。性能测试是使用特定的计算机系统进行的，反映了MacBook Pro的大致性能。
“世界上最快的浏览器”：苹果公司于2020年8月和10月在完成测试的浏览器上使用JetStream 2、MotionMark1.1和Speedeter 2.0性能基准进行了测试。测试时在预发行Safari 14和最新稳定版本的Chrome、Firefox和(Windows)Microsoft Edge上进行了测试，安装在基于英特尔酷睿i5的13英寸MacBook Pro系统(预发行MacOS Big Sur和在Boot Camp中运行的Windows 10 Home)；12.9英寸iPad Pro(第四代)，预发行iPadOS 14和基于英特尔酷睿i7的Microsoft Surface Pro 7系统(Windows 10 Pro)；iPhone 11 Pro Max(预发行iOS 14和三星Galaxy S20 Ultra)。性能将根据使用情况、系统配置、网络连接和其他因素而有所不同。“运行JavaScript的速度高达1.5倍，响应速度快近2倍”：苹果在2020年9月和10月使用JetStream2和Speedeter 2.0性能基准进行了测试。在预生产的MacBook Air和Mac迷你系统上进行了测试，这些系统配备了Apple M1芯片和8核GPU，以及生产的1.2 GHz四核英特尔酷睿i7 13英寸MacBook Air系统和3.6 GHz四核英特尔酷睿i3 Mac迷你系统，所有这些系统都配置了16 GB RAM、2TB固态硬盘和预发行的MacOS Big Sur。使用预发布的Safari 14.0.1和WPA2 Wi-Fi网络连接进行测试。性能将根据系统配置、网络配置、网络连接和其他因素而有所不同。
note_en:
Cupertino, California — Apple today announced M1, the most powerful chip it has ever created and the first chip designed specifically for the Mac. M1 is optimized for Mac systems in which small size and power efficiency are critically important. As a system on a chip (SoC), M1 combines numerous powerful technologies into a single chip, and features a unified memory architecture for dramatically improved performance and efficiency. M1 is the first personal computer chip built using cutting-edge 5-nanometer process technology and is packed with an astounding 16 billion transistors, the most Apple has ever put into a chip. It features the world’s fastest CPU core in low-power silicon, the world’s best CPU performance per watt, the world’s fastest integrated graphics in a personal computer, and breakthrough machine learning performance with the Apple Neural Engine. As a result, M1 delivers up to 3.5x faster CPU performance, up to 6x faster GPU performance, and up to 15x faster machine learning, all while enabling battery life up to 2x longer than previous-generation Macs.  With its profound increase in performance and efficiency, M1 delivers the biggest leap ever for the Mac. 1
  “There has never been a chip like M1, our breakthrough SoC for the Mac. It builds on more than a decade of designing industry-leading chips for iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch, and ushers in a whole new era for the Mac,” said Johny Srouji, Apple’s senior vice president of Hardware Technologies. “When it comes to low-power silicon, M1 has the world’s fastest CPU core, the world’s fastest integrated graphics in a personal computer, and the amazing machine learning performance of the Apple Neural Engine. With its unique combination of remarkable performance, powerful features, and incredible efficiency, M1 is by far the best chip we’ve ever created.”
    Macs and PCs have traditionally used multiple chips for the CPU, I/O, security, and more. Now with M1, these technologies are combined into a single SoC, delivering a whole new level of integration for greater performance and power efficiency. M1 also features a unified memory architecture that brings together high-bandwidth, low-latency memory into a single pool within a custom package. This allows all of the technologies in the SoC to access the same data without copying it between multiple pools of memory, further improving performance and efficiency.
    M1 features an 8-core CPU consisting of four high-performance cores and four high-efficiency cores. Each of the high-performance cores provides industry-leading performance for single-threaded tasks, while running as efficiently as possible. They are the world’s fastest CPU cores in low-power silicon, allowing photographers to edit high-resolution photos with lightning speed and developers to build apps nearly 3x faster than before. And all four can be used together for a huge boost in multithreaded performance.
    The four high-efficiency cores deliver outstanding performance at a tenth of the power. By themselves, these four cores deliver similar performance as the current-generation, dual-core MacBook Air at much lower power. They are the most efficient way to run lightweight, everyday tasks like checking email or browsing the web, and preserve battery life like never before. And all eight cores can work together to provide incredible compute power for the most demanding tasks and deliver the world’s best CPU performance per watt.
    M1 includes Apple’s most advanced GPU. It benefits from years of analysis of Mac applications, including everyday apps and challenging pro workloads. With industry-leading performance and incredible efficiency, the GPU in M1 is in a class by itself. Featuring up to eight powerful cores capable of running nearly 25,000 threads simultaneously, the GPU can handle extremely demanding tasks with ease, from smooth playback of multiple 4K video streams to rendering complex 3D scenes. With 2.6 teraflops of throughput, M1 has the world’s fastest integrated graphics in a personal computer.
    The M1 chip brings the Apple Neural Engine to the Mac, greatly accelerating machine learning (ML) tasks. Featuring Apple’s most advanced 16-core architecture capable of 11 trillion operations per second, the Neural Engine in M1 enables up to 15x faster machine learning performance. In fact, the entire M1 chip is designed to excel at machine learning, with ML accelerators in the CPU and a powerful GPU, so tasks like video analysis, voice recognition, and image processing will have a level of performance never seen before on the Mac.
    Apple’s latest image signal processor (ISP) for higher quality video with better noise reduction, greater dynamic range, and improved auto white balance.
    A high-performance storage controller with AES encryption hardware for faster and more secure SSD performance.
  Low-power, highly efficient media encode and decode engines for great performance and extended battery life.
  An Apple-designed Thunderbolt controller with support for USB 4, transfer speeds up to 40Gbps, and compatibility with more peripherals than ever.
    macOS Big Sur is engineered, down to its core, to take full advantage of all the capability and power of M1, delivering a massive boost in performance, astonishing battery life, and even stronger security protections. With M1, things users do every day feel noticeably faster and smoother. Just like iPhone and iPad, the Mac now instantly wakes from sleep. Browsing with Safari — which is already the world’s fastest browser — is now up to 1.5x speedier at running JavaScript and nearly 2x more responsive. 2
  With Big Sur and M1, Mac users can run a greater range of apps than ever before. All of Apple’s Mac software is now Universal and runs natively on M1 systems. Existing Mac apps that have not been updated to Universal will run seamlessly with Apple’s Rosetta 2 technology. And iPhone and iPad apps can now run directly on the Mac. Additionally, the foundations of Big Sur are optimized to unlock the power of M1, including developer technologies from Metal for graphics to Core ML for machine learning.
    M1 powers the new  MacBook Air, 13-inch MacBook Pro, and Mac mini. They join the rest of the Mac product line to form the strongest Mac lineup ever. This is the beginning of a transition to a new family of chips designed specifically for the Mac. The transition to Apple silicon will take about two years to complete, and these three systems are an amazing first step.
      Apple revolutionized personal technology with the introduction of the Macintosh in 1984. Today, Apple leads the world in innovation with iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, and Apple TV. Apple’s five software platforms — iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS — provide seamless experiences across all Apple devices and empower people with breakthrough services including the App Store, Apple Music, Apple Pay, and iCloud. Apple’s more than 100,000 employees are dedicated to making the best products on earth, and to leaving the world better than we found it.
  “World’s fastest CPU core in low-power silicon”: Testing conducted by Apple in October 2020 using preproduction 13-inch MacBook Pro systems with Apple M1 chip and 16GB of RAM measuring peak single thread performance of workloads taken from select industry standard benchmarks, commercial applications, and open source applications. Comparison made against the highest-performing CPUs for notebooks, commercially available at the time of testing. Performance tests are conducted using specific computer systems and reflect the approximate performance of MacBook Pro.  “World’s best CPU performance per watt”: Testing conducted by Apple in October 2020 using preproduction 13-inch MacBook Pro systems with Apple M1 chip and 16GB of RAM. Performance per watt refers to the ratio of peak CPU performance to average power consumed using select industry standard benchmarks. Comparison made against high-performing CPUs for notebooks and desktops, commercially available at the time of testing. Performance tests are conducted using specific computer systems and reflect the approximate performance of MacBook Pro.  “World’s fastest integrated graphics in a personal computer”: Testing conducted by Apple in October 2020 using preproduction 13-inch MacBook Pro systems with Apple M1 chip and 16GB of RAM using select industry standard benchmarks. Comparison made against the highest-performing integrated GPUs for notebooks and desktops, commercially available at the time of testing. Integrated GPU is defined as a GPU located on a monolithic silicon die along with a CPU and memory controller, behind a unified memory subsystem. Performance tests are conducted using specific computer systems and reflect the approximate performance of MacBook Pro.
 “World’s fastest browser”: Testing conducted by Apple in August and October 2020 using JetStream 2, MotionMark 1.1, and Speedometer 2.0 performance benchmarks on browsers that completed the test. Tested with prerelease Safari 14 and latest stable versions of Chrome, Firefox, and (Windows) Microsoft Edge at the time of testing, on Intel Core i5-based 13-inch MacBook Pro systems with prerelease macOS Big Sur and Windows 10 Home running in Boot Camp; 12.9-inch iPad Pro (4th generation) units with prerelease iPadOS 14 and Intel Core i7-based Microsoft Surface Pro 7 systems with Windows 10 Pro; and iPhone 11 Pro Max with prerelease iOS 14 and Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra with Android 10. Devices tested with a WPA2 Wi-Fi network connection. Performance will vary based on usage, system configuration, network connection, and other factors.  “Up to 1.5x speedier at running JavaScript and nearly 2x more responsive”: Testing conducted by Apple in September and October 2020 using JetStream 2 and Speedometer 2.0 performance benchmarks. Tested on preproduction MacBook Air and Mac mini systems with Apple M1 chip and 8-core GPU, as well as production 1.2GHz quad-core Intel Core i7-based 13-inch MacBook Air systems and 3.6GHz quad-core Intel Core i3-based Mac mini systems, all configured with 16GB RAM, 2TB SSD, and prerelease macOS Big Sur. Tested with prerelease Safari 14.0.1 and WPA2 Wi-Fi network connection. Performance will vary based on system configuration, network configuration, network connection, and other factors.
